data_table.description: This dataset represents variables used to collect eligibility information about health status and functionality of eyes (e.g. occurrence of eye surgery, photocoagulation, intra-ocular pressure, eye medication, fundus exam, acuity), as assessed at the eligibility screening.

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: OHB1
variable.description: History of ocular surgery

variable.name: OHB2
variable.description: History of glaucoma

variable.name: OHB3
variable.description: History of chronic need for ocular medication

variable.name: OHB4
variable.description: History of photocoagulation

variable.name: OHB5
variable.description: History of other ocular condition

variable.name: OHC1
variable.description: Intra-ocular pressure (mmhg) - right eye

variable.name: OHC2
variable.description: Intra-ocular pressure (mmhg) - left eye

variable.name: OHC3
variable.description: Intra-ocular pressure is >/= 23 mmhg

variable.name: OHD1
variable.description: Either lens is missing

variable.name: OHD2
variable.description: Evidence of iris neovascularization

variable.name: OHE1ARE
variable.description: Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance (indicate if plus [+] or minus [-] were used): sphere - right eye

variable.name: OHE1ALE
variable.description: Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance (indicate if plus [+] or minus [-] were used): sphere - left eye

variable.name: OHE1BRE
variable.description: Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance (indicate if plus [+] or minus [-] were used): cylinder - right eye

variable.name: OHE1BLE
variable.description: Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance (indicate if plus [+] or minus [-] were used): cylinder - left eye

variable.name: OHE1CRE
variable.description: Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance (indicate if plus [+] or minus [-] were used): axis - right eye

variable.name: OHE1CLE
variable.description: Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance (indicate if plus [+] or minus [-] were used): axis - left eye

variable.name: OHE1DRE
variable.description: Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: no corrections - right eye

variable.name: OHE1DLE
variable.description: Corrective lenses obtained by subjective refraction for distance: no corrections - left eye

variable.name: OHE2
variable.description: Myopia > 7 diopters in one or both eyes

variable.name: OHF1
variable.description: Distance between patient and chart

variable.name: OHF2A
variable.description: Total number of letters correct at 4 meters - right eye

variable.name: OHF2B
variable.description: Total number of correct letters > 45 letters - right eye

variable.name: OHF2C
variable.description: Total number of letters correct at 4 meters - left eye

variable.name: OHF2D
variable.description: Total number of correct letters > 45 letters - left eye

variable.name: OHF3RE
variable.description: Visual acuity score - right eye

variable.name: OHF3LE
variable.description: Visual acuity score - left eye

variable.name: OHG1
variable.description: Evidence of photocoagulation

variable.name: OHG2
variable.description: Evidence of scars, atrophy, etc.

variable.name: OHG3RE
variable.description: Evidence of diabetic retinopathy - right eye

variable.name: OHG3LE
variable.description: Evidence of diabetic retinopathy - left eye

variable.name: OHG4RE
variable.description: If answer to question OHG3RE is no: total number of correct letters is >/=50 letters - right eye

variable.name: OHG4LE
variable.description: If answer to question OHG3LE is no: total number of correct letters is >/=50 letters - left eye

variable.name: OHG5RE
variable.description: If answer to question OHG3RE is yes: the degree of retinopathy is < P2 - right eye

variable.name: OHG5LE
variable.description: If answer to question OHG3LE is yes: the degree of retinopathy is < P2 - left eye

variable.name: OHH1
variable.description: Quality fundus photos are unobtainable

variable.name: OHI1
variable.description: Patient was deemed ineligible at this visit

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
